title: Site Information
text:
The current build is from 29 November 2025.
The website was created by me using Quarto pages. It is hosted with Netlify, and the source code can be found on the public GitHub repo here.
The site typeface is Atkinson Hyperlegible Next, an accessibility-focused design created by the Braile Institute (more information here).
Significant thanks to Jose Toledo Lunaâ€™s instructions, which provided much needed instruction.

title: Mason Kellerman
text:
I currently attend the University of California, Los Angeles, and will be graduating this spring with Psychology, B.A. and Statistics & Data Science, B.S. degrees, with a minor in Educational Studies.
I am interested in on designing effective measures/assessments which enable effective and consistent causal conclusions about underlying features. I care about making a positive impact on individuals with my work through affecting institutional progress. More information about me can be found in my resume.
I am interested in opportunities that further this vision; I appreciate all outreach :)
